TopicTitle: Getting the Kerbin/Water/Landed surface sample legitimately?

Articles.Content: The game has science reports allocated for being "Landed" on kerbin's water, which seem to indicate that they expect the player to be underwater when performing these experiments. at the moment you can get them all at the end of the runway because of some interesting biome map painting so that's handy, however assuming that eventually gets fixed, is there a legitimate way to get a kerbonaut to walk around underwater without floating to the surface for long enough to take a sample?
